text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: It was a wondrous moment.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
When the three converged near the finish, they each wanted time to 
stop right there.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
But as if her fate was guided by the alpha star inscribed in her name, 
the racer in blue crossed the finish line, spelling the end of that 
moment.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: The name of that star was Admire Vega.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: Their goal should have been to cross that line quickly, and yet…

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
If it were possible, they would have stayed racing in their shared 
moment forever.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
The battle of the Classics has come at last. Leading off is the first 
race in the series, the Satsuki Sho.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
Today we have with us the first, second and third favorites to win the 
race. It's the trio on everyone's lips, BNW!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uuugh… I'm so nervous it's making me itchy…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm not used to you being so quiet. It's making me nervous!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Deep breaths… nice and slow.

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Inhale… Exhale…

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
I'd now like to begin today's press conference with the runners of the 
Satsuki Sho.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
I understand that the three of you are good friends. How do you feel 
facing each other in the same race?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
When we entered the academy, we talked about racing together. 
Now that the time's finally here, it's rather exciting.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Um… Same for me.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, me too! Put me down as samesies with Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: C-copycats…

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
The public has endearingly dubbed the three of you "BNW". Leading 
into the Classics, what would you like to say to the public?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You two go first this time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: After you, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wha, me?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uh… The… the BWH trio is gonna make it big!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: …Isn't "BWH" a set of measurements?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Gaaaaagh! I messed it up!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I've never seen such a botched press conference.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well, sometimes we have to let Ticket do her thing.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm still SO embarrassed just thinking about it!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Ah! It's BNW!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: We just saw your press conference! You're such a joker, Tickezo!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I didn't do it on purpose!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text:
You were amazing in the Yayoi Sho! I turned into a total Tickezo fan 
after that!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: For real?! Thanks! Keep watching, I'm gonna win the Satsuki Sho too!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: Um, do you think I could get your autographs?!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text: Me too, please!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, fine with you two, right? I just got used to signing my name!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Phew, that was a lot of signing!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's finally calmed down. I didn't think a crowd could form so quickly.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: And now we see who's most popular. You were signing nonstop, huh?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I dunno if I'm happy or embarrassed…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But every year, over a hundred thousand fans show up to see the 
Derby, you know? I gotta be able to sign like the wind!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Sorry? Don't tell me you're gonna give autographs to a hundred 
thousand people.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I know it's impossible, but I wish I could. Even in that press 
conference, I felt like I couldn't let all those people down.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
For all the autographs I can't sign, I gotta give them a race that'll 
make them really happy!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe, sometimes you say some poignant things.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe! Oh, yeah! You two wanna take some photos together to turn 
into stickers?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
We're about to start the Classics, so it'd be like a sign of our 
determination!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Seems like kind of a weird way to show that… But sure, why not?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, look, look! This booth makes faces look smaller! You're always 
worried about how big your head is, right, Hayahide?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I worry about the abundance of my hair! Not the size of my head!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, was that it? Whatever! Check it out—you can write stuff on the 
pics, so let's put "Derby" on there!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Why "Derby"?! The next race is the Satsuki Sho!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hehe! Come on, it'll be fun! We're gonna race through the Classics 
togetheeer!
